sections.title: One place to build, run, and monetize your agents
sections.subtitle: Govern access, trace every step, and turn reusable modules into paid products.

sections.title: One platform, two surfaces
sections.subtitle: Prototype in natural language. Scale in code.

faqItems.question: What is DecoCMS, and how is it different from other AI app builders?
faqItems.answer: DecoCMS is an open-source Context CMS — a control plane and runtime for building, running, and monetizing AI-powered agentic apps. Unlike traditional app builders, it unifies context, governance, observability, and monetization in one platform.

faqItems.question: Do I need to be a developer to use DecoCMS?
faqItems.answer: Not at all. Business teams can create prompts, workflows, and agents without writing code, while developers can extend, customize, and deploy advanced capabilities using our TypeScript SDK and CLI.

faqItems.question: How does DecoCMS handle governance and observability?
faqItems.answer: Every run is fully traced, auditable, and secure. DecoCMS includes role-based access control (RBAC), spend caps, error analytics, and per-step cost visibility — ensuring safe operations and compliance by default.

faqItems.question: Can I self-host DecoCMS or bring my own keys (BYOK)?
faqItems.answer: Yes. DecoCMS is open-source and fully portable. You can self-host it on your infrastructure, bring your own API keys, and maintain full control over your data and costs.

faqItems.question: Can I ensure my data stays private and secure when self-hosting DecoCMS?
faqItems.answer: Absolutely. When you self-host DecoCMS, your data, models, and keys stay fully under your control. DecoCMS never stores or transmits your data unless you explicitly configure it to.

faqItems.question: How much does DecoCMS cost?
faqItems.answer: You start with $2 in free credits — no credit card required. After that, pricing is usage-based, so you only pay per run, with full transparency and real-time cost tracking in your dashboard.
